name: The Sensitive Pirates
description:
Controls:

MovementWASDAttackLeft Mouse Button

🏴‍☠️

'The Sensitive Pirates' is a top-down classic zelda-like with pseudo random map generation made in under 3 hours where you play as a pirate invading different islands and trying to kill enemies and find useful objects to maintain your senses (sight, sound, smell, taste and touch) to avoid an unfurtonate death... while you loot some sweet treasure, of course. Yarr! 🏴‍☠️

🏴‍☠️

It was made in a bit under 3 hours for the Trijam #167, which had the theme "Heightened senses".
